# c-dealer-header



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                        | Type     | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | -------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `logo`      | `logo`       | A placeholder for dealer logo image                | `string` | `undefined` |
| `shortName` | `short-name` | Short name that will appear in smaller screen size | `string` | `undefined` |
| `siteName`  | `site-name`  | Dealer name                                        | `string` | `undefined` |
| `siteUrl`   | `site-url`   | A link that will be applied to the site-name       | `string` | `'/'`       |
| `theme`     | `theme`      |                                                    | `string` | `undefined` |


## Dependencies

### Depends on

- [c-header](../header)
